abilities.name: A Plan Generations in the Making
abilities.rule: At the end of your Command phase, if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

abilities.name: Cult Icon
abilities.rule: In your Command phase, you can return up to 3 destroyed models to the bearerâ€™s unit. If the bearerâ€™s unit is within range of an objective marker you control, you can return up to D3+3 destroyed models to that unit instead. This ability cannot be used to return destroyed **CHARACTER** models in Attached units and any **[ONE SHOT]** weapons equipped by returned models that were shot before they were destroyed are still considered to have been shot.
